parameters.query:
SELECT
p.id as prod_code,
p.ean as prod_ean,
p.description as prod_name,
b.id as brand_id,
b.description as brand_name,
s.id as section_id,
s.description as section_description,
c.id as category_id,
c.description as category_name,
sc.id as subcategory_id,
sc.description as subcategory_name,
p.ean_valid,
(select count(pl.id) from productslinked pl where pl.prodl_prod_id=p.id) as qtd,
p.created_at,
p.updated_at
FROM products p
INNER JOIN brands b on b.id=p.prod_brand_id
INNER JOIN subcategories sc on sc.id=p.prod_subcat_id
INNER JOIN categories c on c.id=sc.subcat_cat_id
INNER JOIN sections s on s.id=c.cat_sec_id
WHERE EAN IN (SELECT EAN FROM products GROUP BY EAN HAVING COUNT(ID)>1) ORDER BY p.EAN ASC,qtd desc,p.DESCRIPTION ASC

SELECT
    p.id AS prod_code,
    p.ean AS prod_ean,
    p.description AS prod_name,
    b.id AS brand_id,
    b.description AS brand_name,
    s.id AS section_id,
    s.description AS section_description,
    c.id AS category_id,
    c.description AS category_name,
    sc.id AS subcategory_id,
    sc.description AS subcategory_name,
    p.ean_valid,
  (select count(pl.id) from productslinked pl where pl.prodl_prod_id=p.id) as qtd,
    p.created_at,
    p.updated_at
FROM products p
INNER JOIN brands b ON b.id = p.prod_brand_id
INNER JOIN subcategories sc ON sc.id = p.prod_subcat_id
INNER JOIN categories c ON c.id = sc.subcat_cat_id
INNER JOIN sections s ON s.id = c.cat_sec_id
WHERE p.description IN (
    SELECT description
    FROM products
    WHERE description<>''
    GROUP BY description
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT prod_subcat_id) > 1
)
ORDER BY p.description ASC,sc.description ASC;

nodes.name: Buscar Produtos com mesmo nome e subcategoria diferente

parameters.query:
SELECT
    p.id AS prod_code,
    p.ean AS prod_ean,
    p.description AS prod_name,
    b.id AS brand_id,
    b.description AS brand_name,
    s.id AS section_id,
    s.description AS section_description,
    c.id AS category_id,
    c.description AS category_name,
    sc.id AS subcategory_id,
    sc.description AS subcategory_name,
    p.ean_valid,
  (select count(pl.id) from productslinked pl where pl.prodl_prod_id=p.id) as qtd,
    p.created_at,
    p.updated_at
FROM products p
INNER JOIN brands b ON b.id = p.prod_brand_id
INNER JOIN subcategories sc ON sc.id = p.prod_subcat_id
INNER JOIN categories c ON c.id = sc.subcat_cat_id
INNER JOIN sections s ON s.id = c.cat_sec_id
WHERE p.description IN (
    SELECT description
    FROM products
    WHERE description<>''
    GROUP BY description
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ean) > 1
)
ORDER BY p.description ASC,sc.description ASC;

nodes.name: Buscar Produtos com mesmo nome e ean diferente

parameters.query: select * from productslinked where prodl_prod_id in (select id from products where description='')

nodes.name: Buscar Produtos com Descrição vazia e produto vinculado

parameters.query: select * from (select *,(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM productslinked pl where pl.prodl_prod_id=p.id) as col0 from products p) as db where col0=0 order by description
update productslinked set linked_at=null, prodl_prod_id=1 where id = {{ $json.id }}

SELECT
    p.id AS prod_code,
    p.ean AS prod_ean,
    p.description AS prod_name,
    b.id AS brand_id,
    b.description AS brand_name,
    s.id AS section_id,
    s.description AS section_description,
    c.id AS category_id,
    c.description AS category_name,
    sc.id AS subcategory_id,
    sc.description AS subcategory_name,
    p.ean_valid,
  (select count(pl.id) from productslinked pl where pl.prodl_prod_id=p.id) as qtd,
    p.created_at,
    p.updated_at
FROM products p
INNER JOIN brands b ON b.id = p.prod_brand_id
INNER JOIN subcategories sc ON sc.id = p.prod_subcat_id
INNER JOIN categories c ON c.id = sc.subcat_cat_id
INNER JOIN sections s ON s.id = c.cat_sec_id
WHERE ean_valid=0
ORDER BY p.description ASC,sc.description ASC;
